Alissa.buffs: A garden fills with life as Alissa hums her sweet tunes.#You gain +3 Farming with her by your side.
Corine.buffs: Corine's fiery ambition and energy inpsires and pumps you up!#You gain +1 Speed, +1 Defense, and +1 Attack with her by your side.
Daia.buffs: Everything, even lady-luck herself, seems to fall for Daia's seductive smile.#You gain +2 Luck and +32 Magnetism with her by your side.
Flor.buffs: With such watchful yet quiet eyes, Flor helps you spot dropped objects from a distance.#You gain +64 Magnetism with her by yor side.
Ian.buffs: Ian's perserverance and hardworking demeanor influences you to work harder.#You gain +80 MaxStamina with him by your side.
Jeric.buffs: Here goes Jeric being competitive all over again.#It's getting you pumped up!#You gain +2 Farming, +2 Fishing, and +1 Foraging with him by your side.
Jio.buffs: Jio makes sure you're always prepared for battle.#He teaches you proper stances, breathing, and effectively using your weapon.#You gain +3 Attack and +2 Speed with him by your side.
June.buffs: Jio makes sure you're always prepared for battle.#He teaches you proper stances, breathing, and effectively using your weapon.#You gain +3 Attack and +2 Speed with him by your side.
Kenneth.buffs: Give Kenneth a workbench and he won't stop talking about gadgets and gizmos!#You gain +5 Crafting with him by your side.
Maddie.buffs: Maddie's knowledge of minerals and local flora proves handy in your adventures.#You gain +3 Mining and +2 Foraging with her by your side.
Philip.buffs: With an abundance of caution, Philip monitors your proper body mechanics as you do your daily activities.#You gain +4 Defense with him by your side.
Shiro.buffs: Shiro's company makes you feel at ease.#There's something about him that warms your heart.#You gain +3 Luck and +60 MaxStamina with him by your side.
Ysabelle.buffs: Ysabelle moves with such grace, you can't help but to be in awe.#She becomes an inspiration!.#You gain +3 Speed and +20 MaxStamina with her by your side.
Kiwi.buffs: Kiwi is super fast, and you feel the need to keep up.#You gain +5 Speed from all the pressure you're feeling.
Keahi.buffs: Keahi radiates rambunctious energy and imparts his crafty ways unto you.#You gain +2 Digging, Mining, and Crafting and +30 MaxStamina from him!
Trinnie.buffs: Trinnie radiates sparkling energy and shares the farming tips her big sis taught her.#You gain +3 Farming and Foraging and +30 MaxStamina with her!
June.buffs: June may be a musician, but he is well traveled.#You gain +2 Luck and +2 Attack while exploring the wilds together.
Blair.buffs: Blair's an expert fisherwoman like her mother!#You gain +3 Fishing and +1 Luck with her by your side!
Sean.buffs: Sean's enthusiasm and curiosity is infectious!#You gain +32 Magnetism and +2 Luck with him by your side!
Kiarra.buffs: Kiarra's drive ignites a spark of motivation from you!#You gain +2 Luck and +2 Defense with her around!
Anton.buffs: Anton is keen about details of his surroundings.#You gain +2 Defense and +2 Mining with him around.
Paula.buffs: Paula's always making sure you're okay!#You gain +64 MaxStamina with her around!
Faye.buffs: Faye's fabulous personality inspires you!#You gain +2 Speed, +1 Foraging, and +1 Farming!
Bryle.buffs: Bryle's quite protective and cautious!#You gain +3 Attack and +1 Defense.
Irene.buffs: Irene's cooking fuels you up!#You gain +3 Foraging and +32 MaxStamina with her by your side.
Zayne.buffs: Zayne's dependable personality assures you're safe.#You gain +2 Defense and +32 Magnetism with him by your side.
Yuuma.buffs: Yuuma's a hardworking kid. And that's inspiring.#You gain +32 MaxStamina and +2 Farming.
Louie.buffs: Louie's surprisingly receptive of his surroundings.#You gain +3 Luck and +32 Magnetism with him around.
Lenny.buffs: Lenny's fun personality energizes you!#You gain +32 Magnetism, +32 MaxStamina, and +1 Luck with her around!
